title: COVID-19 vaccine studies push for minority volunteers, but it's 'a hard sell'
author: FOX News
description: It has not been an easy sell, which is why Charles and Lisa Wynn of Parker, Colorado, decided to join Moderna's COVID-19 vaccine trial, the COVE Study, earlier this fall at UCHealth. "We've been in this for about a month," Lisa Wynn, an OBGYN with UCHealth [and senior instructor of obstetrics and gynecology at CU School of Medicine], says. "So it's given a lot of people opportunity to ask us how we're doing, and how do we feel, and do we feel safe?"
